name: alcazarhotel
short_description:
http://hotelalcazarnicaragua.com/en

Alcazar is a beautiful boutique hotel featuring seven custom designed suites, each with its own unique personality. Totally renovated and updated in 2012, we are located just steps from the Pacific Ocean in the charming fishing village of San Juan Del Sur. Enjoy the aromas of the tropical off shore breezes and famous Latin American sunsets, unbelievable! 

Step back in time as you travel to San Juan Del Sur about two hours from Managua’s international airport. You will pass through small villages, fields of sugar canes, groves of papaya and plantain trees and pass ox carts carrying produce to local markets as they have done for hundreds of years. ALCAZARING-Al-ca’-zahr-ing(al-kuh-zahr-ing) verb: indulgent relaxation on our open air balconies or beaches while enjoying your favorite beverage as the sun slow sets.
